titleInfo.title: Church of the Lord Jesus Christ service, 1996 November 30

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service opened by Carl Porter and followed by singing led by Bill Pelfrey. Shade Miller, Bill Pelfrey, and Carl Porter handle a large rattlesnake, which is followed by laying on of hands led by Porter's wife. A congregant speaks in tongues, which is followed by preaching by a visiting preacher from Kentucky.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
